price: 99. Et si ton Seigneur l’avait voulu, tous ceux qui sont sur terre auraient cru. Contraindrais-tu donc les hommes à être croyants ?
arabic: وَلَوۡ شَآءَ رَبُّكَ لَأٓمَنَ مَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ كُلُّهُمۡ جَمِيعًاۚ أَفَأَنتَ تُكۡرِهُ ٱلنَّاسَ حَتَّىٰ يَكُونُواْ مُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walaw shāa rabbuka laāmana man fī al-arḍi kulluhum jamīʿan afa-anta tuk'rihu al-nāsa ḥattā yakūnū mu'minīna
